specifications.Finish: Chemical > Enzyme Enzymes treatment offers a remarkably soft hand-feel by gently breaking down the fibers’ surface, resulting in a smoother and cleaner texture. This treatment also reduces pilling and fuzz, enhancing the fabric’s durability and maintaining a clean appearance
specifications.Care Advice: Regenerated > Lyocell This fabric can shrink or become distorted if it get wet. Store it in a cool, dry, well-ventilated location. Chemical > Enzyme Piece printing on enzyme/bio-washed fabric can cause staining. Therefore, please refrain from piece printing on this fabric.
specifications.Care Instructions: Hand wash only Wash separately Turn inside out before washing, Do not wring Do not bleach Line dry Iron on low heat on reverse side if needed Sustainability Certification > Lenzing Tencel™ LENZING™ is a well-recognized viscose fiber brand that practices eco-responsible production for a cleaner and more sustainable environment. Brand Yarn Lenzing LENZING™ is a well recognized viscose fibers brand that practises eco responsible production for a cleaner and sustainable environment.
